name: Luser
description:
L-U-S-E-R.

R-U-L-E-S.

The objective is simple. You move around and shoot down as many enemies as you can, before they get you. But, the controls have been completely messed up!  

I made this for my first 48 hour game jam, the GMTK Game Jam 2020, which had the theme, "Out of Control". This was made purely for fun, and isn't 100% polished. I hope you have as much fun playing it as I had making it!

Thanks,

swarupgt

Controls:

W - Move Left

S - Move Right

A - Move Forward

D - Move Backward

Left Click - Shoot

Move the mouse to look around, but the X and Y axes have been inverted.
